sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that \(t + v = 2u \) and also it is given that 
\[
	\frac{1}{u } + \frac{1}{w } = \frac{2}{v }
\]
Now, prove that \(t \), \(u \), \(v \), and \(w \) are in proportion.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{1}{u } + \frac{1}{w } = \frac{2}{v }
\]
\[
	\frac{w + u }{\input[s1v1]{}w } = \frac{2}{v }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow vw + uv = 2u\input[s1v2]{} 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow vw + uv = (\input[s3v1]{} + \input[s3v2]{} )w 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow vw + \input[s4v1]{}v = tw + vw 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow u\input[s4v2]{} = tw 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\input[s4v1]{} }{u } = \frac{\input[s4v2]{} }{w }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
This means that $t $, $u $, $v $, and $w $ are in proportion.

Hence proved.
\newline
}$$
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["u", "w"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking LCM's and cross-multiplying we get $vw + uv = 2uw $}$$"}, {"data": ["t", "v"], "text": "$$\text{Since, it is given that $t + v = 2u$, replacing $2u$, we get $ vw + uv = (t + v )w $}$$"}, {"data": ["u", "v"], "text": "$$\text{Upon opening up the bracket and cancelling the common terms on both sides we get $uv = tw$}$$ "}, {"data": ["t", "v"], "text": "$$\text{Upon dividing both sides by $uw$, we get $\frac{t }{u } = \frac{v }{w }$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
